lead_paragraph: Hisham Geneina, fired in March as the country’s top auditor, was convicted of spreading false news after saying that corruption had cost Egypt $68 billion over four years.

headline.main: Former Graft Fighter in Egypt Is Sentenced to Jail

snippet: Hisham Geneina, fired in March as the country’s top auditor, was convicted of spreading false news after saying that corruption had cost Egypt $68 billion over four years....
